column5: It's mid February and I should be 15 miles out on Simcoe laying a beating on the whities.  Well as everyone knows there's no ice out there   Now don't get me wrong I don't mind fishing Kemp, but the crowds are out of control and it's not very peaceful when all I hear all day are people constantly yapping back and forth..  So I decided to see if I could get lucky with a really small window I saw opening up yesterday..  It definitely paid off...  By the time I left the river was up again and on the verge of unfishable..
That's awesome!
beauty!
You almost had company...
Nice going Bill! Much prettier than Walleye
that's better than a whitefish anyday
Nicely done bud!  Do I know the river???
No, it's a secret spot you've never been to!   LOL!!!
Sure, but not as cute as a ling.  Good going Bill. Sounds like you had a great weekend of fishing. If only we had rivers like that around here...

We were contemplating hitting it after Simcoe as well LOL.  We figured we already had all the ice stuff and thought there would be thick ice in the slower sections of the river... but I'm guessing it's completely ice free?
Great minds think alike Bil. I did the same thing yesterday. Awesome success for any time of year!   I never seem to remember to take pics. Dan O.
Nice! I already can't wait to hit the rivers.....   TDunn
Nice fish Bill,the long range is now colder for the weekend:wallbash:
Nice fish Bill.  Cold means no run off. Works for me.
Nice work, Bill

Nice fish!!!   Ive been lucky to get out a handful of times so far in 2012 with decent success including a new PB at 29 inches long!! Haven't been able to post any reports though it says the files are to big im not sure how to make them smaller?  Can anyone help me with this?
Use Photobucket.com and copy the IMG tags over..  Easiest way to do it.
Nice fish!
I was so tempted to hit the river on my way home this weekend with my 36" ice rod.LOL  Great fish Bill.
Very nice chrome Bill. Like you, I'm not interested in the Kemp circus lol. Planning to hit a trib this weekend myself.
